location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'The Ashar Creek Basra.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:138 x 190 mmCondition:The print is in good condition throughout with minor toning/fading at all edgesFoliation:‘28’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of the Ashar Creek at Basra. Four canoes carrying people and several moored sailing boats dominate the scene at centre and right. Three men use poles to propel the canoe in the middle-ground. Palms and other vegetation make up the scene on the left and background.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'The Ashar Creek Basra.'Pencil, above image, at right: ‘28’
